processing.text: if @@admin = 0 and @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@@admin, @@userID, 'LoanContract', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end declare @message nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(4000), @irregular nvarchar(4000), @irregularChars varchar(128), @field varchar(32), @baseCurrency varchar(8), @r int, @count int select @irregularChars = &IrregularValue; select @duplicate = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell &LoanContract.Nested.Message.v;.' else 'The value of cell %invalidCell is &LoanContract.Nested.Message.e;.' end select @irregular = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell có chứa các ký tự: ' + @irregularChars else 'The value of cell %invalidCell contains any of the following characters: ' + @irregularChars end select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_ma_nt0' -- Delete if @type = '0' delete @@table where ma_ku in (select ma_ku from dmku) if @$mode = 1 begin &IrregularMessage; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_ku', stt, @message from @@table where ma_ku like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%' &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'ma_ku', @r = min(stt) from @@table where ma_ku like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%'&Irregular; end -- Update update @@table set ma_nt = @baseCurrency where ma_nt = '' -- Checking &Checking; -- Gather select a.* into #m1 from @@table a join (select ma_ku, min(stt) as stt from @@table group by ma_ku) b on a.stt = b.stt select ma_ku, cast(0 as numeric(3, 0)) as line_nbr, ls, ngay_hl into #d1 from @@table where ngay_hl is not null select a.* into #m2 from #m1 a join dmku b on a.ma_ku = b.ma_ku -- Do not delete following line -- #OverwriteChecking if @type = '1' delete #m1 from #m1 a where exists(select 1 from #m2 b where a.ma_ku = b.ma_ku) -- Checking create index i on #m1 (ma_ku) select @field = 'ma_ku' &LoanContract.Nested.Key.b; if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, ''00003'' from #m1 a, #m1 b with (index(i)) where a.ma_ku <> b.ma_ku and a.ma_ku like rtrim(b.ma_ku) + ''%'' &w1;@field, ''@@primaryKeyList''&w2;a.stt&w3;''00003''&w4; group by a.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, ''00003'' from #m1 a with (index(i)), dmku b with (index(PK_dmku)) where a.ma_ku like rtrim(b.ma_ku) + ''%'' &w1;@field, ''@@primaryKeyList''&w2;a.stt&w3;''00003''&w4; group by a.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, b.stt, ''00003'' from dmku a with (index(PK_dmku)), #m1 b with (index(i)) where a.ma_ku like rtrim(b.ma_ku) + ''%'' &w1;@field, ''@@primaryKeyList''&w2;b.stt&w3;''00003''&w4; group by b.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @q = 'select top 1 @r = a.stt from #m1 a, #m1 b with (index(i)) where a.ma_ku <> b.ma_ku and a.ma_ku like rtrim(b.ma_ku) + ''%''' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@r int output', @r = @r output&Duplicate; select @q = 'select top 1 @r = a.stt from #m1 a with (index(i)), dmku b with (index(PK_dmku)) where a.ma_ku like rtrim(b.ma_ku) + ''%''' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@r int output', @r = @r output&Duplicate; select @q = 'select top 1 @r = b.stt from dmku a with (index(PK_dmku)), #m1 b with (index(i)) where a.ma_ku like rtrim(b.ma_ku) + ''%''' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@r int output', @r = @r output&Duplicate; end end &EndErrorMode; select b.ma_ku, b.line_nbr, a.ls, a.ngay_hl into #d2 from #d1 a join ctdmku b on a.ma_ku = b.ma_ku and a.ngay_hl = b.ngay_hl if @type = '1' delete #d1 from #d1 a where exists(select 1 from #d2 b where a.ma_ku = b.ma_ku and a.ngay_hl = b.ngay_hl) -- Insert &Inserting; select @count = count(*) from #d1 if @count > 0 begin select top 0 ma_ku, cast(null as smalldatetime) as ngay_hl, identity(int, 1, 1) as stt into #o1 from dmku select top 0 ma_ku, cast(0 as int) as line_nbr into #stt from #o1 insert into #stt select b.ma_ku, max(b.line_nbr) from #d1 a join ctdmku b on a.ma_ku = b.ma_ku group by b.ma_ku, a.ngay_hl insert into #o1(ma_ku, ngay_hl) select ma_ku, ngay_hl from (select ma_ku, ngay_hl from #d1 union select distinct ma_ku, null from #d1) a order by ma_ku, ngay_hl select stt, ma_ku into #o2 from #o1 where ngay_hl is null update #d1 set line_nbr = b.stt + isnull(c.line_nbr, 0) from #d1 a left join (select c.stt - d.stt as stt, c.ma_ku, c.ngay_hl from #o1 c join #o2 d on c.ma_ku = d.ma_ku) b on a.ma_ku = b.ma_ku and a.ngay_hl = b.ngay_hl left join #stt c on a.ma_ku = c.ma_ku insert into ctdmku(ma_ku, line_nbr, ls, ngay_hl) select ma_ku, line_nbr, ls, ngay_hl from #d1 end -- Update if @type = '1' begin &ListWhenBeforeImportUpdateLog; update dmku set @@list from dmku a, #m2 b where a.ma_ku = b.ma_ku update ctdmku set ls = b.ls from ctdmku a, #d2 b where a.ma_ku = b.ma_ku and a.line_nbr = b.line_nbr end
